metadata.metaValue: Switch conversion method depending on the array's structure.
If the higher dimension is of size 1, then we just get the value to avoid using loops for nothing.
Array indices selector algorithm. Thanks to Jonah Friedman for hinting about the none-explicit loop method.
We compare the largest and the smallest size of each sub-sizes and sub-sub_sizes. If they are equal, we convert the 3D array using the parallel loop.
